summary: The Nitazene Control Act of 2025 aims to permanently schedule nitazenes, a class of synthetic opioids, under Schedule I of the Controlled Substances Act. The bill addresses the increasing presence of these dangerous designer drugs in the illicit drug supply, which contribute to overdoses and poisonings.  It outlines the chemical definition of nitazenes and specifies that previously temporarily scheduled nitazenes will become permanently scheduled upon the Act's enactment.  The bill also clarifies that research on these substances must adhere to proper registration and scheduling compliance.
